page.title: 01GAZETTEER ON AMBLE AREA
page.content: {A. Main centre of population:}Amble {Local Government:}Amble Town Council {Main Occupations:}Building Trades, Fishing, Mining, Service Industries {Buildings:}Churches including St Cuthbert's (Anglican) St Mark's (United Reformed) {Education:}First, Middle, High Schools {Public Houses:}Mason's Arms, Wellwood Arms, Waterloo, Dock, Fourways {Restaurants:}Marina Arms, The Granary {B. Main Village:}Warkworth {Local Government:}Warkworth Parish Council {Main Occupations:}Doctors, Teachers, Solicitors, Farming, Retired People {Buildings:}Warkworth Castle St Lawrence's Church {Hotels:}Warkworth House, Grange Hotel, The Sun Hotel {Public Houses:}The Hermitage, Mason's Arms, Black Bull
